title: What's the lightest web browser for Windows? - Quora

response.answer_text: Are you sure you want to use the lightest/smallest web browser?You could try Lynx. http://lynx.browser.org/Download it at; ftp://ftp.invisible-island.net/lynx/lynx-oldssl-setup.exe It's a command line browser, so no images, no clicking on web links, no CSS, no Javascript, no good if you don't know how to type.You need to install some libraries before it will work.
One that you make with visual basic to generate an executable with no oddball junk beyond the basic controls. The file itself tends to be in kilobytes.
